Abyssal Blade.Description: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

Overwhelm.description: Stun a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity.

Bash.description: Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
Bash.Extra:
Bash Chance for Melee Heroes: 25%
Bash Chance for Ranged Heroes: 10%

Abyssal Blade.Extra Info: Can be disassembled. Cannot be purchased by Slardar, Faceless Void, Troll Warlord, Spirit Breaker.

Aghanim&#39;s Scepter.Description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

Ultimate Upgrade.description: Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.
